Posts.Content: Jul 22, 2018 11:50AM nancybb wrote: Hi, I am Nancy. Dx 5/18 with Stg 4 MBC (recurrence of br ca successfully treated 21 yrs ago). This came on silently. Developed Pleural effusion that led to thoracentesis to permanent chest tube needing draining everyday along with changing the dressing. I am staying stubbornly strong. Tx available very limited. Grateful for each day.
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH
